application.model.neuralnetwork.backpropagation

Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.neuralnetwork.backpropagation.NeuralNetwork

  • public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    NeuralNetwork class represents a neural network.

      • createNetwork

        public void createNetwork(int inputNeurons,
                          int hiddenNeurons,
                          int outputNeurons)
        Creates a network structure.
        Parameters:
        inputNeurons - number of input neurons
        hiddenNeurons - number of hidden neurons
        outputNeurons - number of output neurons

      • train

        public void train(int maxSteps,
                  double minError)
        Starts training network until it reaches the maximum number of steps the network or the global error is equal to or less than the minimum of the global error.
        Parameters:
        maxSteps - the maximum number of steps in learning
        minError - the value of the minimum errors

      • trainOneStep

        public void trainOneStep()
        Train NN only one epoch.
